channel.title: SourceForge.net: SF.net Project News: RSS Library for Java
channel.description: SF.net Project News: RSS Library for Java (informa project) - The Informa RSS Library provides a convenient Java API for handling news channels and metadata about them. Different syntax formats (like RSS 0.91 and 1.0 RDF) for channels are supported. It is planned to also support channel information descriptions.
channel.copyright: Copyright and acceptable usage information for this RSS may feed may be found at: http://sourceforge.net/docman/display_doc.php?docid=6048&group_id=1#licensing_and_other_terms

image.title: SourceForge.net logo
image.description: The world's largest Open Source software development website

item.title: Informa 0.2.6 released
item.description: The Informa RSS Library provides a convenient Java API for handling news channels and metadata about them. Different syntax formats (like RSS 0.91 and 1.0 RDF) for channels are supported. It is planned to also support channel information descriptions. This release improves the flexibilty of channel parsing, the channel format defintion and contains also some bug fixes. (0 comments)
item.author: niko_schmuck@users.sourceforge.net (Niko Schmuck)

item.title: Informa 0.2.4 available
item.description: A new alpha release of Informa is now available with some interface improvements and support for RSS 2.0. (0 comments)
item.author: niko_schmuck@users.sourceforge.net (Niko Schmuck)

item.title: Informa 0.2.2 is out
item.description: The next alpha release can now be downloaded. A new RDF 1.0 news channel export has been added, some minor documentation issues fixed and the package structure polished. (0 comments)
item.author: niko_schmuck@users.sourceforge.net (Niko Schmuck)

item.title: Second alpha release available
item.description: Contains some more JavaDoc comments. (0 comments)
item.author: niko_schmuck@users.sourceforge.net (Niko Schmuck)

item.title: First alpha release of Informa is now out
item.author: niko_schmuck@users.sourceforge.net (Niko Schmuck)
